#summary Benchmark results for Q9400 Vista 64
#labels Featured
=Introduction=
Here are the results of a benchmark test performed using JMatrixBenchmark in early September 2009.  EJML was compared to several other matrix libraries. The following plots show relative performance as a function of matrix size. *Larger values are better*.

For more information on how the tests were performed and comments about why/how
these tests were performed see the benchmark document on the main page.  If the results for an operation are missing for a particular library that means the library did not support the operation as a single function call.

[ BenchmarkQ9400#Basic_Operation_Results]

= Test Environment =

  * Intel Q9400 Quad 2.66 GHz
  * Vista 64bit
  * JVM 1.6.0_16 64bit
